attributes.action: where there has been an independent pay commission setup to keep his sticky little fingers out of public pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current Prime minister in his previous roll as chancellor has helped setup quite a few public pay commissions but now he's Prime minister has chosen to ignore most of them and do his own thing.  We therefore request the Prime minister to stop gerrymandering with public pay and find another way to control the economy!
